but how well you think you slept could be just as important.</description>     <dc:date>2014-01-27T14:07:54Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/motivation-and-time-management/5-great-energising-study-ideas">     <title>5 great energising study ideas</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/motivation-and-time-management/5-great-energising-study-ideas</link>     <description>If you're trying to study, then you need to feel clear-headed. Here are five quick and easy ways to stay energetic and alert. </description>     <dc:date>2014-01-08T17:35:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/what-can-an-online-game-tell-you-about-studying">     <title>What can an online game tell you about studying?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/what-can-an-online-game-tell-you-about-studying</link>     <description>Scientists have used an online game to investigate how people learn new skills.</description>     <dc:date>2014-01-08T15:30:59Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/how-does-education-compare-across-the-world">     <title>How does education compare across the world?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/how-does-education-compare-across-the-world</link>     <description>The results of the international PISA tests, which measure the aptitude of 15 year olds in maths, reading, and science, were recently released to the public. </description>     <dc:date>2013-12-04T12:30:22Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/motivation-and-time-management/learn-to-motivate-yourself">     <title>Learn to motivate yourself</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/motivation-and-time-management/learn-to-motivate-yourself</link>     <description>You've sat down to do your homework, but no matter how hard you try, you just can't get started. These tips will help you get inspired.</description>     <dc:date>2013-11-19T10:20:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/homework-and-study-skills/brush-up-your-english-skills">     <title>Brush up your English skills</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/homework-and-study-skills/brush-up-your-english-skills</link>     <description>It\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds always good to revise your basic English skills so simple mistakes in spelling, punctuation and grammar don\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdt let you down.</description>     <dc:date>2013-09-02T09:20:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/homework-and-study-skills/revision-and-study-techniques">     <title>Study techniques</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/study-support/homework-and-study-skills/revision-and-study-techniques</link>     <description>When deadlines loom, the common reaction is to run and hide.
